settings.title: Add Functional Benefits To Any Drink
settings.text: Unflavored Hydration Drops

settings.title:
Best Electrolytes
for leg cramps
settings.text: Say goodbye to leg cramps with the latest innovation in hydration. Buoy's unflavored and unsweetened electrolyte drops turns any beverage into a hydrating, electrolyte drink without the sugar, sweeteners, flavors or junk.

settings.title: Best electrolytes
settings.text: Say goodbye to leg cramps for good with Buoy's natural electrolyte drops that enhance any drink with fast-acting hydration.

settings.subscription_benefits:
• ‚úì Save 24% Every Order

  • ‚úì 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

settings.title: ‚ö°Ô∏è Maintain Hydration
settings.text: W

settings.title: ü¶µ Prevent Muscle Camps
settings.text: Even mild deficiencies in electrolyte levels can impact efficient muscle contractions.

settings.title: üìà Boost Physical Recovery
settings.text: Electrolytes work to support a healthy gut. Buoy‚Äôs minerals and biological elements help to balance the microbiome, fortify the gut lining and enhance the gut‚Äôs inflammation response.

settings.title: üí¶ Make The Most Of Your Water
settings.text: Your liver requires adequate electrolytes and trace minerals to remove unwanted toxins. Buoy promotes these enzymatic reactions by replenishing mineral deficiencies.

settings.title:
The importance of electrolytes
in active lifestyles
settings.text_bottom: Losing just 2% of fluids and key electrolytes can significantly impair physical performance. When you exercise, you lose 6 to 10%. Restoring these electrolytes and fluids can improve performance and may even boost it above your baseline.

settings.title: Dehydration
settings.text: You lose electrolytes from basically existing. Even if you‚Äôre drinking the recommended half-gallon of water every day, you need electrolytes to make the most of the water you‚Äôre intaking.

settings.title: Nutrient Deficiencies
settings.text: Losing as little as 2% of key electrolytes and fluids can significantly impair physical and mental performance. When you exercise, you lose 6-10%. Restoring these lost electrolytes can improve performance and even boost it above your baseline.

settings.title: Not Stretching
settings.text: People starting out on the Keto diet can feel like they have the flu even when they don‚Äôt--irritable mornings, dizziness, low energy and insomnia. In ketosis, your body burns fatty acids instead of glucose for energy. Within five days of cutting out the carbs, your insulin levels drop, cueing your kidneys to release sodium from your body. No wonder low glycogen and insulin levels have similar symptoms as dehydration--you‚Äôre peeing out all those energy bunny electrolytes. A steady intake of key electrolytes sodium, potassium and magnesium help fight the Keto Flu.

settings.description: Essential electrolytes, 87 trace minerals and vitamins delivered in their most bioavailable form factor for fast-acting hydration and wellness.

settings.title: Optimized for function,  not flavor
settings.text:
Sugar Free

Stevia & Sweetener Free

No Flavors

Vegan

Non-GMO

3x More Bioavailable Form Factor

settings.title: Sugar
settings.subtitle: Found in: Gatorade, Liquid IV, Nuun
settings.text: Not only does sugar cause inflammation and disease, it can also make you more dehydrated. Sugar intake can work against electrolyte function.

settings.title: Stevia
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: ULTIMA, LMNT, NUUN
settings.text: Stevia was prohibited in consumer products until 1991 in the United States and 2018 in the European Union for its connections to gut inflammation, kidney disease and cancer. Sugar lobbyists paid to regulate it.

settings.title: Dextrose
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: GATORADE, LIQUID IV, NUUN
settings.text: A simple sugar derived from corn, dextrose consumption causes fluid build up, spikes in blood pressure and excessive thirst.

settings.title: Natural Flavors
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: LIQUID IV, NUUN
settings.text: The FDA allows any food additive originating in nature to be labeled as a Natural Flavor, meaning sketchy solvents and preservatives like BHA and  propylene glycol are basically perfumes for your mouth. Vanilla and Strawberry originate from compounds in beaver anal and sexual glands.

settings.title: Inefficient Form Factors
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: SPORTS DRINKS, POWDERS, TABLETS
settings.text: Liquid electrolytes are more bioavailable and faster absorbing than powders and tablets. Often times, electrolytes in powders and tablets get left behind in your cup and glass.

settings.title: Artificial Additives
settings.text: There‚Äôs a laundry list of ingredients from dyes, oils, chemical alternatives to electrolytes, blending and bleaching agents and artificial ingredients added in for taste that you can find in natural grocery markets.

settings.title: Invest in You with 35% off
settings.text:
Staying hydrated is one of the first things a healthcare professional recommends for chronic illness management.

Buoy offers a clean, effective, and easy-to-use alternative to the other electrolyte companies out there.

We say no to:
settings.text_bottom: Get Buoy's lifetime discount of 35% off when managing a chronic illness. Applying is easy and takes less than 2 minutes.

settings.title: Get Your Chronic Illness Discount
settings.text: Get an additional 15% off Buoy's already discounted subscription plan if you have a chronic illnesses and you're looking for clean hydration.

settings.title: Donations to Nonprofits
settings.text: We donate a bottle for every bottle sold on our website to a verified 501(c)3 nonprofit supporting chronic illness communities. If you don‚Äôt have an illness, you can still support those who do.

settings.title: Chronic Illness Creators
settings.text: For Summer 22, we‚Äôre investing only in creators with chronic conditions. These talented creators are often tokenized, unpaid and under-represented and it‚Äôs time they got their bag.
All Day Energy
Nutrient Absorption
Healthy Gut Biome
Detoxification
Lifted Moods
Radiant Skin
Clean hydration for whole-body health

settings.suptext: With every bottle purchased, we donate a bottle to a nonprofit supporting people with chronic illnesses that need clean hydration.

settings.title: Seawater Electrolytes
settings.text: Hand harvested, seawater electrolytes from protected marine sea salt in the South of France. Preserved in their naturally-occurring, balanced ratios for deep hydration your cells crave.

settings.title: Deep Ocean Trace Minerals
settings.text: 87 ionically charged trace minerals and biological elements from the deep ocean that revitalize, restore and rebuild at the cellular level.

settings.title: B Vitamins
settings.text: A curated blend of plant-powered B vitamins that support routine electrolyte function and facilitate energy production.

settings.title: Antioxidants
settings.text: Soothe the daily inflammation that depletes electrolyte and mineral levels faster than your body naturally would with plant-powered antioxidants.

settings.title: Ingredients your body can actually absorb
settings.subtext: Harvested | Bioavailable | Fast-Absorbing

settings.suptext: of American's sodium intake is from processed salt
settings.text:
Nutrient sparse sources found in table salt and processed foods (like sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride) are used by electrolyte supplements because they're cheap.

These sodium sources are essentially baking soda and road salt and lack the nutritional density and bioavailable structure for effecient hydration

Buoy's harvested sea salt is preserved in its naturally-occurring ionic state from protected marine areas in the South of France that's loaded with trace minerals for fast-acting cellular hydration.

Modern agricultural practices and commercial water have depleted our soil and natural water sources of essential minerals, making them hard to find even in the healthiest diets.

Even minor deficiencies or imbalances can negatively impact our ability to absorb nutrients.

Squeeze them back into your diet with Buoy's 87 ionic trace minerals preserved in their naturally-occurring ionic states for high bioavailability and fast-absorption.

settings.title: A better way to hydrate
settings.subtext: Add a fast-acting electrolyte and mineral replenishment to all your favorite drinks.

settings.text: BOARD OF HEALTH PROFESSIONALS
settings.sub-text: Consisting of scientists, researchers, pharmaceutical experts, and health professionals, our board of health professionals continue to challenge and uphold us and our products to the highest standards.

settings.title: Is it really flavorless?
settings.answer:
Electrolytes, vitamins, and ionic trace minerals are bitter by nature. That‚Äôs why traditional sports drinks and hydration supplements use sugar and sweeteners to offset their intense taste.

Finding the balance between effective, clean ingredients and a neutral flavor profile took our team of scientists two years to get right. With a proper dosage in a full drink, you should notice little to no taste.

settings.title: What kind of testing do you do?
settings.answer:
All Buoy products are third-party tested.

All products are tested for impurities like toxins, microbes, metals, allergens and other contaminants. We also test for shelf-stability and accurate nutrition labels.

For every product we create, we publish whitepapers highlighting their efficacy and safety.

settings.title: How long until I see results?
settings.answer:
Buoy‚Äôs hard-to-find essential nutrients are important for foundational health in the long run.

Depending on how chronically dehydrated you are when you start Buoy will affect how intense of a feeling you might notice. Headaches, cramping, midday fatigue, grogginess and drier skin are all symptoms of dehydration.

While a lot of people using Buoy notice results after about a week of consistent use, some don‚Äôt‚Äîand that‚Äôs okay.

It can take up to a month or two for your body to reach a new normal. Rest assured, our high bioavailable and fast-absorbing ingredients get to work quickly and target nutrient gaps in the American diet.

settings.title: How does the Clear Pee Club work?
settings.answer:
Never run dry with our flexible subscription plan.

Buoy‚Äôs ingredient panel supports foundational health with hydration and minerals that work at the cellular level. We created a product important for daily life. We centered our business model around long-term discounts that help you build healthy habits.

Before each shipment, we‚Äôll send you an email and text to make sure you‚Äôre ready. Rush, delay or cancel your subscription at any time, right from your phone or laptop.

Try our subscription risk free. If we‚Äôre not a good fit after your first month, we‚Äôll give you a full refund.

settings.title: Will Buoy break my fast?
settings.answer:
Nope ü§†.

We‚Äôre talking to you, keto and intermittent fasting dieters. We formulated all Buoy products to be a sidekick to any diet, specifically those looking to stay in ketosis or a fasting state.
